detail.app_languages: English, German, Japanese, French, Korean, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
Real VR Fishing: Update Announcement
We are thrilled to announce a new wave of updates and improvements to enhance your Real VR Fishing experience. Dive into the details below and get ready to cast your line with even more excitement!

1. Convict Sergeant Fish Event
2. Japan Journey Expansion
3. Improvements to the Fishdex: Removing the Max Level and Expert indications for Unique Fish
4. Warmouth Translation Update
5. Bobber LED Updates: USW 19 (San Francisco Bay), US Free 5 (Kee Beach)
6. Bug Fixes - Fish Length Discrepancy: The fish length displayed in the completion popup and on the leaderboard will be same now.
7. Bug Fixes - Seawater Lodge BGM Issue: The serene background music that was missing at the Seawater Lodge is now back.

These updates are part of our ongoing commitment to providing you with an immersive and enjoyable fishing experience. We always welcome your feedback and look forward to bringing even more enhancements in the future.
Tight lines and happy fishing!
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
